languages.text: {n}Арджента взирает на безвольное хрупкое тельце, на ее лбу появляется мучительная складка.{/n} "Столь хрупкое создание, и сколько веса на ее плечах..."
{n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента взирает на безвольное хрупкое тельце, на ее лбу появляется мучительная складка.{/n} "Столь хрупкое создание, и сколько веса на ее плечах..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful line appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."
{n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful line appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

{n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."
{n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

languages.text: {n}Argenta betrachtet Cassia, und eine Linie, die von Schmerz kündet, erscheint auf ihrer Stirn.{/n} "So ein zartes Wesen und solch eine schwere Bürde auf ihren Schultern ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta betrachtet Cassia, und eine Linie, die von Schmerz kündet, erscheint auf ihrer Stirn.{/n} "So ein zartes Wesen und solch eine schwere Bürde auf ihren Schultern ..."

languages.text: {n}La peine que ressent Argenta en regardant Cassia lui fait froncer les sourcils.{/n} « Une créature si fragile, avec un si lourd fardeau sur les épaules... »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La peine que ressent Argenta en regardant Cassia lui fait froncer les sourcils.{/n} « Une créature si fragile, avec un si lourd fardeau sur les épaules... »

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔看着卡西娅，心疼地皱起了眉。{/n}“如此脆弱的姑娘，却肩负着如此沉重的负担……”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔看着卡西娅，心疼地皱起了眉。{/n}“如此脆弱的姑娘，却肩负着如此沉重的负担……”

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはカシアを見やり、痛々しく眉間にしわを寄せる。{/n}「か弱い身にそのような重荷を…」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはカシアを見やり、痛々しく眉間にしわを寄せる。{/n}「か弱い身にそのような重荷を…」

languages.text: {n}Argenta mira a Cassia y su entrecejo se frunce de dolor.{/n} «Un ser tan frágil no debería soportar una carga tan pesada...».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta mira a Cassia y su entrecejo se arruga de dolor.{/n} «Un ser tan frágil no debería soportar una carga tan pesada...».

languages.text: {n}Argenta, Cassia'ya bakıyor ve kaşları acıyla çatılıyor.{/n} "Bu kadar kırılgan bir şey, omuzlarında ne de ağır bir yük taşıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at Cassia, and a painful furrow appears on her brow.{/n} "Such a fragile thing with such a heavy burden upon her shoulders..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, Cassia'ya bakıyor ve kaşları acıyla çatılıyor.{/n} "Bu kadar kırılgan bir şey, omuzlarında ne de ağır bir yük taşıyor."
